Website builder and content management systems are the two most popular ways to create a website. Which one should you use for a simple, yet professional-looking website? To answer that, today I’ll compare Hostinger vs WordPress. Starting with Hostinger review on how to build a website, it’s a really modern solution, it incorporates a lot of AI technology and designs, offering full drag-and-drop controls for easy customization. Meanwhile, WordPress requires more experience but also has more freedom when building.
